classes.name: Lifesaver
classes.desc: You are very kind, we will reward you with a thank you NFT and mention your name on our twitter

classes.name: Humanitarian
classes.desc: You are the best, get everything from lifesaver and get an access to our private sale ICO

classes.name: Superhero
classes.desc: You are awesome! get everything from Humanitarian and a limited edition NFT and also 1-1 meeting via discord with our team

classes.name: Guardian Angel
classes.desc: Can't do this without you! get everything from Superhero and get listed as one of our founders
